form.label: Geolocation of Traffic
form.description: Map showing the geolocation of client IPs with HTTP status other than 404, 500, 503

search.query: sourcetype="access" HTTP_Status!=404 HTTP_Status!=500 HTTP_Status!=503 | where unit_name = "$unit_name$" | search client_ip!=192.168* client_ip!=0.0.* client_ip!=10.* | stats count as _geo_count by client_ip | geoip client_ip

sourcetype="access" HTTP_Status!=404 HTTP_Status!=500 HTTP_Status!=503 | where unit_name = "$unit_name$" | stats count as _geo_count by client_ip | geoip client_ip | stats count by client_ip_country_name | sort - count | head 10
